name: Dimension Shift
description: Reality bends around your gameplay. Features: Emotional Color Engine, Time Echoes, Ghost Trails, Rhythm Pulse World, and Dimension Fractures.

ghost-trail.name: Ghost Trail
ghost-trail.description: Your past attempts haunt the level as translucent ghosts

time-echo.name: Time Echo
time-echo.description: Objects ripple through time based on your death count

emotion-engine.name: Emotion Engine
emotion-engine.description: World colors shift based on your performance patterns

rhythm-pulse.name: Rhythm Pulse
rhythm-pulse.description: The world breathes and pulses to the music

dimension-fracture.name: Dimension Fractures
dimension-fracture.description: Reality cracks appear at death points

pulse-intensity.name: Pulse Intensity
pulse-intensity.description: How strongly the world reacts to music

max-ghosts.name: Max Ghost Trails
max-ghosts.description: Maximum number of ghost replays shown
